text: % Advanced ossification of carpal bones - Advanced tarsal ossification - Anterior rib cupping - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Brachydactyly syndrome - Disproportionate short-limb short stature - Dumbbell-shaped long bone - Flat acetabular roof - Flat midface - Hypoplastic scapulae - Lateral clavicle hook - Metaphyseal irregularity - Ovoid vertebral bodies - Short ribs - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
